title: 1880 John Ward Cabinet SGC Auth - looking for who bought this
author: sycks22

posts.post_title: 1880 John Ward Cabinet SGC Auth - looking for who bought this
posts.post_content: I'm looking for who bought this from me a couple years ago?  Frank something.  Let me know if you're the Frank I need to talk to.  Thanks
Any idea who the photographer was?

[quote name="Runscott" post=1103214]Any idea who the photographer was?[/QUOTE]

Joseph Hall.

This is the same pose for his S.F. Hess card, (supposedly I've never seen it)

[url]http://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2010/106.html[/url]
I know I sold this cabinet to a guy named Frank a couple years back.  Which Frank was it?  Please pm me if you got this from me.  Thanks
